column1: When Alexander Bell invented the telephone he had 3 missed calls from Chuck Norris.

column1: There used to be a street named after Chuck Norris
column2: but it was changed because nobody crosses Chuck Norris and lives.

column1: Chuck Norris has a grizzly bear carpet in his room. The bear isn't dead it is just afriad to move.

column1: Chuck Norris has already been to Mars; that's why there are no signs of life.

column2: Chuck Norris can swim through land.

column1: Chuck Norris and Superman once fought each other on a bet. The loser had to start wearing his underwear on the outside of his pants.

column2: he checks his closet for Chuck Norris.

column1: Death once had a near-Chuck Norris experience
Chuck Norris can slam a revolving door.

column1: Chuck Norris' hand is the only hand that can beat a Royal Flush.

column1: Some people wear Superman pajamas. Superman wears Chuck Norris pajamas.
